The video was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and has been viewed more than 1,400 times.
The video shows a rocket bursting into f: with an English-language voiceover describing the explosion as it occurs.
The caption of the Facebook post: written in traditional Chinese characters, translates to English as: "8:47 am on August 7! The United States failed to launch rockets, and the launch site was blown up. Yellow media [and] biased journalists...will not report on this!"
A reverse image search using InVID: WeVerify found a longer version of the video published on the YouTube channel of the US television station WAVY-TV on October 28, 2014.
